content: Quick dinner with eggs and tomatoes?

👩‍🍳 Chef CTS – Quick & Safe Eggs + Tomatoes Dinner Plan (20 min) **Base:** spaghetti, cherry tomatoes, garlic. **Steps** - Boil water in a pot with salt for pasta al dente taste. 
- Sauté chopped garlic and halved cherry tomatoes until softened; season to taste (2–3 min). Add drained spaghetti directly into the skillet, tossing it all together gently over low heat for about a minute more. Drizzle with olive oil if needed before serving hot!
- **Swaps:** Use any leftover veggies; try adding bell peppers or spinach next time to bulk up your meal without extra prep work - they cook quickly too and add great color & flavor contrast.
